note.p: Born in America. Daughter of Joseph Dalton Hooker’s sister Maria, and her husband, Walter McGilvray. Married Henry Ashburnham Toll Newman in Edinburgh in 1883.
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 22 November 2018)
Scotland statutory marriages 685/4 109 St Giles (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 22 November 2018)
